customer_reviews.title: If you buy this item from this store the manufacturer will not honor the warranty
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after little use and no neglect or abuse after 6 months. I contacted the seller for a warranty claim. The seller Beauty drive referred me to the manufacturer page. The manufacturer specifically omits sales from this amazon Seller from its warranty policy. This is extremely deceptive from the manufacturer. What would the listed seller on Amazon be referenced in a warranty unless the product was know to be defective and sold through these channels.
customer_reviews.author: TXRymac

customer_reviews.title: ... been using inexpensive "cheap" flat irons since and never happy with results
customer_reviews.text: I grew my hair to mid length from short a few years ago and have been using inexpensive "cheap" flat irons since and never happy with results. My hairdresser recommended Croc. I was hesitant for price but wow, what a difference. My hair is thin but frizzy. This thing does a fabulous job. I followed instructions and found about 300 degrees works well for me. If this lasts awhile, its worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: satisfied  Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I had my first Croc flat iron for nearly 10 years and when it stopped working, I went through several competitors that are less expensive and they can not compare! The temp control, infrared to support hair health and growth and the ergonomic design are the best! Great for curling too!

customer_reviews.title: Croc Infrared Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 5 years ago and used it weekly for me and my girls. It had dropped on my hardwood floor too many times and the ceramic plate separated from the back. As far as the new infrared Croc, I was disappointed that the red, infrared strip has been reduced to 1/3 it's width from the one I bought years ago. It still straightens our curls like the older model. The ergonomic design is the same and allows for a better grip than other flat irons that are just oval or rectangular. I love my Croc flat iron.

customer_reviews.title: Flat iron review
customer_reviews.text: The inside where the infrared red bar is sometime pulls my hair out. My hair is wavy/thick and I still find I have to go over areas more than once. I don't notice my hair in better condition. I do wish it was like my Chi iron and it beeped once it reached the temperature set. It is a comfortable iron to use. I have colored short to medium length hair that is thick.

product_meta.title: Croc 1.5" Infrared Classic Professional Flat Iron 1 1/2 Inch Hair Straightener

It reconditions and reconstructs your hair while maintaining health and providing powerful styling. Faster heat penetration makes styling quicker which keeps your hair healthier. A retro and futuristic hair conditionaing straightener. Dual plate technology: provides fast heat up and even heat distribution. Large amount of infrared heat offers highly efficacious, fast acting, non toxic, and non allergic properties Fully digital 18 custom temperature setting from 280°F to 450°F Seals in moisture, adds silky shine, and maintains style for all day Size: 1 inch and 1.5 inch Made in Korea
